product_name: 180s Bluetooth Ear Warmers with Headphones - 2013 Overstock
long_description: The 180s Bluetooth(R) Ear Warmers with Headphones let you stay warm and connected to your music and calls with the high-definition sound of the Bluetooth wireless speakers. Bluetooth wireless technology built into the ear warmers allows you to take calls and listen to music from other Bluetooth-enabled devices, such as a smartphone. Bluetooth speakers provide 8 hrs. of music time and 9 hrs. of talk time on a full charge; ear warmers include a USB cable for charging the built-in battery. The 180s Bluetooth(R) Ear Warmers with Headphones fit comfortably around the back of the head and over your ears; click-to-fit frame adjusts to fit various head sizes. Collapsible design provides convenient pocket-sized storage. Styling allows wear with hats, helmets or glasses. Overstock.
short_description: The 180s Bluetooth(R) Ear Warmers with Headphones let you stay warm and connected to your music and calls with the high-definition sound of the Bluetooth wireless speakers.
